response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is worth $1,200,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the chance to purchase it at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty, installation support, and a dedicated team of experts to ensure a smooth integration into your existing systems.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's anything else I can provide to make your decision easier. I am confident that this investment will pay off in terms of efficiency gains and cost savings for your organization.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
